snippet: The Justice Department’s national security division partly recused itself from the inquiry into what one lawmaker called “a cascade of leaks” to the news media about secret programs like cyberwarfare.
abstract: Calls mount for a special counsel to investigate leaks of classified information by the Obama administration after the Justice Department's national security division partly recuses itself from the inquiry; recusal indicates that the Justice Department may have been the source of some of the disclosures.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department’s national security division partly recused itself from the inquiry into what one lawmaker called “a cascade of leaks” to the news media about secret programs like cyberwarfare.

headline.seo: Calls Grow for Special Counsel to Investigate Leaks
headline.main: Pressing for Leak Inquiry by a Special Counsel
headline.print_headline: Pressing for Leak Inquiry By a Special Counsel
